name: The Trolley Problem (BlackSquid)
description:
Team Name
BlackSquid

Gameplay instructions:2 local players needed!
No 1 player mode.

Player 1 (left side)
Keyboard controls:
WASD - moving
Enter - shooting
Space - sprint
OR
Gamepad controls:
Left stick - moving
A - sprint
X/Right Trigger - Shoot

Player 2 (right side)
MOUSE ONLY
LMB - spawn from menu bar
RMB - lift placed enemies of ground
Mouse Y - camera movement

Player 1 must destroy the locomotive in order to stop the kidnapping of the princess.
Player 2 must protect the locomotive at all cost, and needs to keep P1 away. P2 can also damage the locomotive himself, if he is not careful. If the time runs out before the train gets destroyed, Player 2 wins! If the train gets stopped, Player 1 wins!

Platform
Windows 64-bit

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission:

Terrain and Trees (modified) from Kenny.nl
Revolver model (modified) from lodgeb84 on Blendswap.com
Train model (modified) from mazwi on Blendswap.com
Sounds from Soundly
Music from patrickdearteaga.com
Victory/Defeat sound from https://freesound.org/
UI Heart and Stamina bar from UE4 Marketplace (SDF Robo Progress Bars)
